title: The Guiding Light of Judy Ross
summary: Judy Ross, a 38-year-old advisor, discovers her ability to foresee future threats and uses her skills to guide her city to safety amidst a series of eerie events.
summaryGerman: Judy Ross, eine 38-jährige Beraterin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, zukünftige Bedrohungen vorherzusehen und nutzt ihre Fähigkeiten, um ihre Stadt während einer Reihe von unheimlichen Ereignissen in Sicherheit zu bringen.
summaryDutch: Judy Ross, een 38-jarige adviseur, ontdekt haar vermogen om toekomstige bedreigingen te voorzien en gebruikt haar vaardigheden om haar stad veilig te leiden te midden van een reeks griezelige gebeurtenissen.
summaryFrench: Judy Ross, une conseillère de 38 ans, découvre sa capacité à prévoir les menaces futures et utilise ses compétences pour guider sa ville vers la sécurité au milieu d'une série d'événements étranges.

story.text: Judy Ross starts her week feeling unusually energetic. At her office, she suddenly visualizes a strange cloud looming over the city park. Intrigued and concerned, she decides to investigate after work.

At the park, Judy encounters a mysterious figure who hints at imminent danger. She uses her advisory skills to gather more insights from the enigmatic stranger, who disappears as mysteriously as he appeared.
Using her newfound foresight, Judy warns the local authorities about a potential disaster. Skeptical at first, they are convinced when minor incidents start occurring as Judy had predicted.
Judy feels the tension build as the predicted day nears. She spends her day advising local businesses and residents to take precautions, her reputation as a reliable source growing.
The day of the foreseen disaster arrives. Judy coordinates with emergency services as they brace for the unknown. Thanks to her guidance, the city is prepared.
The disaster— a sudden, severe storm— hits the city. Thanks to Judy's predictions, damage is minimal and there are no casualties. Her abilities prove invaluable, and she becomes a local hero.
The city holds a small ceremony in honor of Judy, recognizing her heroic deeds. Feeling immensely proud and peaceful, she contemplates her future role in safeguarding her community.

ending: With her newfound powers, Judy Ross continues to guide and protect, becoming a beacon of hope in her community.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility; use your unique abilities to make a positive impact in the world.
